title: Sonne
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei, vier, fünf, sechs, sieben, acht, neun, aus
lines.translation: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, out
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Alle warten auf das Licht
lines.translation: Everyone is waiting for the light
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Fürchtet euch, fürchtet euch nicht
lines.translation: Fear not, fear not
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die Sonne scheint mir aus den Augen
lines.translation: The sun is shining out of my eyes
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sie wird heut Nacht nicht untergeh'n
lines.translation: She will not go down tonight
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und die Welt zählt laut bis zehn
lines.translation: And the world counts aloud to ten
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Eins, hier kommt die Sonne
lines.translation: One, here comes the sun
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Zwei, hier kommt die Sonne
lines.translation: Two, here comes the sun
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Drei, sie ist der hellste Stern von allen
lines.translation: Three, she is the brightest star of all
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Vier, hier kommt die Sonne
lines.translation: Four, here comes the sun
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die Sonne scheint mir aus den Händen
lines.translation: The sun shines from my hands
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Kann verbrennen, kann euch blenden
lines.translation: It can burn you, it can blind you
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wenn sie aus den Fäusten bricht
lines.translation: When it breaks from the fists
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Legt sich heiß auf das Gesicht
lines.translation: It lies hot on the face
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sie wird heut Nacht nicht untergeh'n
lines.translation: She will not go down tonight
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und die Welt zählt laut bis zehn
lines.translation: And the world counts aloud to ten
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.translation: One, here comes the sun

lines.translation: Two, here comes the sun

lines.translation: Three, she is the brightest star of all

lines.translation: Four, here comes the sun

lines.translation: Five, here comes the sun

lines.translation: Six, here comes the sun
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sieben, sie ist der hellste Stern von allen
lines.translation: Seven, it is the brightest star of all
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Acht, neun, hier kommt die Sonne
lines.translation: Eight, nine, here comes the sun
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die Sonne scheint mir aus den Händen
lines.translation: The sun shines from my hands
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Kann verbrennen, kann dich blenden
lines.translation: It can burn you, it can blind you
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wenn sie aus den Fäusten bricht
lines.translation: When it breaks from the fists
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Legt sich heiß auf dein Gesicht
lines.translation: It lies hot on your face
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Legt sich schmerzend auf die Brust
lines.translation: It lies painfully on the chest
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Das Gleichgewicht wird zum Verlust
lines.translation: The balance becomes a loss
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Lässt dich hart zu Boden geh'n
lines.translation: It brings you down hard.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und die Welt zählt laut bis zehn
lines.translation: And the world counts aloud to ten
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.translation: Three, she is the brightest star of all

lines.text: Vier, und wird nie vom Himmel fallen
lines.translation: Four, and will never fall from the sky
